statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -4 \\ 1 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 2 \\ -1 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 13 \\ 14 \\ -4 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -19 \\ -18 \\ 4 \\ -9 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 0 \\ -4 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 46 \\ 40 \\ -7 \\ 37 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
